title: Nash Equilibrium and Axiom of Choice Are Equivalent. (arXiv:2306.01790v1 [math.LO])
abstract: In this paper, I prove that existence of pure-strategy Nash equilibrium in games with infinitely many players is equivalent to the axiom of choice.
context:
Title: Nash Equilibrium and Axiom of Choice Are Equivalent. (arXiv:2306.01790v1 [math.LO])
Abstract: In this paper, I prove that existence of pure-strategy Nash equilibrium in games with infinitely many players is equivalent to the axiom of choice.
translated_abstract: 本文证明了，对于有无穷多个玩家的博弈，存在纯策略Nash均衡是等价于选择公理的。
tldr: 无穷多人博弈中，存在纯策略Nash均衡与选择公理等价。
en_tdlr: The existence of pure-strategy Nash equilibrium in games with infinitely many players is equivalent to the axiom of choice.
